mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize, likecnt) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{photo}, #{communityno}, #{memberno}, #{photo1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{filesize}, #{likecnt})
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize, likecnt FROM REPLY ORDER BY REPLYNO
SELECT replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize, likecnt FROM REPLY WHERE communityno = #{communityno} ORDER BY REPLYNO
SELECT replyno, contents, rdate, photo, communityno, memberno, photo1saved, thumb1, filesize, likecnt FROM REPLY WHERE replyno = #{replyno} ORDER BY REPLYNO
